training_plan.title: Pharmacy Intern Internship Training Plan
training_plan.description: A comprehensive training plan for a 410-hour internship in the Healthcare division, designed to equip interns with the necessary skills and knowledge to excel as a Pharmacy Intern.

tasks.title: Medication Management
tasks.description: Task 1: Review and manage medications for assigned patients under the supervision of a registered pharmacist. Ensure medications are appropriate, effective, and safe for each patient. Document all interventions and communication with the healthcare team.

skills.name: Medication Therapy Management
skills.description: The ability to review and recommend medications for patients based on their health conditions and other factors.

tasks.title: Pharmacy Operations
tasks.description: Task 2: Assist with pharmacy operations, including inventory management, ordering supplies, and data entry. Ensure that all processes comply with policies, procedures, and laws governing pharmacy practice.

techStacks.name: Microsoft Office
techStacks.description: A suite of productivity tools including Word, Excel, and Outlook.

skills.name: Pharmacy Operations Management
skills.description: The ability to manage and optimize pharmacy operations to ensure efficient and effective patient care.

tasks.title: Patient Education
tasks.description: Task 3: Educate patients on the proper use of medications, including dosage, side effects, and storage. Provide verbal and written information, and answer any questions patients may have.

skills.name: Patient Communication
skills.description: The ability to communicate effectively with patients, including those with limited health literacy or language barriers.

tasks.title: Task 7: Review and Organize Pharmacy Inventory
tasks.description: Review and organize the pharmacy inventory, checking for expired medications and ensuring all medications are stored properly.

techStacks.name: Microsoft Excel
techStacks.description: Used to create a spreadsheet of the pharmacy inventory, noting the name, quantity, and expiration date of each medication.

skills.name: Organizational Skills
skills.description: The ability to keep the pharmacy inventory organized and up-to-date.

skills.name: Attention to Detail
skills.description: The ability to carefully check each medication for accuracy and expiration dates.

tasks.title: Task 8: Process Prescriptions and Fill Medication Orders
tasks.description: Process prescriptions and fill medication orders, ensuring all information is accurate and medications are dispensed correctly.

techStacks.name: Pharmacy Management Software
techStacks.description: Used to process prescriptions and fill medication orders, as well as to keep track of patient information and medication histories.

skills.name: Typing and Data Entry
skills.description: The ability to accurately and quickly type and enter data into the pharmacy management software.

skills.name: Medication Knowledge
skills.description: The ability to correctly identify and dispense medications based on patient information and prescriptions.

tasks.title: Task 9: Conduct Medication Therapy Management Reviews
tasks.description: Conduct medication therapy management (MTM) reviews with patients, reviewing their medication lists and making recommendations for changes or adjustments as needed.

techStacks.name: Electronic Health Record (EHR) System
techStacks.description: Used to access patient medication lists and health histories, as well as to document MTM review findings and recommendations.

skills.name: Communication Skills
skills.description: The ability to effectively communicate with patients about their medications and any necessary changes.

skills.name: Clinical Judgment
skills.description: The ability to make informed and evidence-based recommendations for medication changes or adjustments.

tasks.title: Medication Management
tasks.description: Manage and maintain accurate medication records for patients, including reconciling medications upon admission and discharge.

techStacks.name: Electronic Health Records
techStacks.description: System used to document and track patient health information.

skills.name: Medication Reconciliation
skills.description: Process of comparing a patient's current medication orders with all of the medications that the patient has been taking.
